duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and conduct experiments and tests, analyze results, and create reports based on engineering principles.
Generate work instructions, test methods, and engineering drawings to establish product and process specifications.
Create and update design control documents, including requirement specs and risk documents.
Assign and give instructions to R&D support technicians, train technicians, and coordinate technician work.
Identify, evaluate, manage, and provide guidance to suppliers, including establishing tolerances and defining acceptance criteria.
Maintain adherence to environmental health and safety guidelines and quality standards for medical device manufacturing.
Interact professionally with all organizational levels and effectively manage vendors and project stakeholders.
Adhere to company rules and requirements, including pandemic protocols and environmental health & safety rules.
Utilize creativity, communication skills, and problem-solving ability to interpret blueprints, technical drawings, and computer-generated reports.
